verses.verse: And this <S%H2063><s%> is the blessing, <S%H1293><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his death. <S%H4194><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from Sinai, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5514><s%> and rose up <S%H2224><s%> from Seir <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8165><s%> unto them; he shined forth <S%H3313><s%> from mount <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2022><s%> Paran, <S%H6290><s%> and he came <S%H857><s%> with ten thousands <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7233><s%> of saints: <S%H6944><s%> from his right hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3225><s%> went a fiery <S%H784><s%> law <S%H1881><s%> for them.

Yea, <S%H637><s%> he loved <S%H2245><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his saints <S%H6918><s%> are in thy hand: <S%H3027><s%> and they <S%H1992><s%> sat down <S%H8497><s%> at thy feet; <S%H7272><s%> every one shall receive <S%H5375><s%> of thy words. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1703><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us a law, <S%H8451><s%> even the inheritance <S%H4181><s%> of the congregation <S%H6952><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

And he was <S%H1961><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> in Jeshurun, <S%H3484><s%> when the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> and the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>
Let Reuben <S%H7205><s%> live, <S%H2421><s%> and not <S%H408><s%> die; <S%H4191><s%> and let not his men <S%H4962><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> few. <S%H4557><s%>

And this <S%H2063><s%> is the blessing of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> Hear, <S%H8085><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> him unto <S%H413><s%> his people: <S%H5971><s%> let his hands <S%H3027><s%> be sufficient <S%H7227><s%> for him; and be <S%H1961><s%> thou a help <S%H5828><s%> to him from his enemies. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6862><s%>

And of Levi <S%H3878><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> Let thy Thummim <S%H8550><s%> and thy Urim <S%H224><s%> be with thy holy <S%H2623><s%> one, <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou didst prove <S%H5254><s%> at Massah, <S%H4532><s%> and with whom thou didst strive <S%H7378><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah; <S%H4809><s%>

Who said <S%H559><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%> and to his mother, <S%H517><s%> I have not <S%H3808><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> him; neither <S%H3808><s%> did he acknowledge <S%H5234><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> his own children: <S%H1121><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they have observed <S%H8104><s%> thy word, <S%H565><s%> and kept <S%H5341><s%> thy covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

They shall teach <S%H3384><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> thy judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> thy law: <S%H8451><s%> they shall put <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H6988><s%> before <S%H639><s%> thee, and whole burnt sacrifice <S%H3632><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thine altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Bless, <S%H1288><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> his substance, <S%H2428><s%> and accept <S%H7521><s%> the work <S%H6467><s%> of his hands: <S%H3027><s%> smite through <S%H4272><s%> the loins <S%H4975><s%> of them that rise against <S%H6965><s%> him, and of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> him, that <S%H4480><s%> they rise not again. <S%H6965><s%>

And of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> The beloved <S%H3039><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in safety <S%H983><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> him; and the LORD shall cover <S%H2653><s%> <S%H5921><s%> him all <S%H3605><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> long, and he shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> between <S%H996><s%> his shoulders. <S%H3802><s%>

And of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be his land, <S%H776><s%> for the precious things <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4022><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> for the dew, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2919><s%> and for the deep <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8415><s%> that coucheth <S%H7257><s%> beneath, <S%H8478><s%>

And for the precious <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4022><s%> fruits <S%H8393><s%> brought forth by the sun, <S%H8121><s%> and for the precious things <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4022><s%> put forth <S%H1645><s%> by the moon, <S%H3391><s%>

And for the chief things <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the ancient <S%H6924><s%> mountains, <S%H2042><s%> and for the precious things <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4022><s%> of the lasting <S%H5769><s%> hills, <S%H1389><s%>

And for the precious things <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4022><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> and fullness <S%H4393><s%> thereof, and for the good will <S%H7522><s%> of him that dwelt <S%H7931><s%> in the bush: <S%H5572><s%> let the blessing come <S%H935><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and upon the top of the head <S%H6936><s%> of him that was separated <S%H5139><s%> from his brethren. <S%H251><s%>

His glory <S%H1926><s%> is like the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of his bullock, <S%H7794><s%> and his horns <S%H7161><s%> are like the horns <S%H7161><s%> of unicorns: <S%H7214><s%> with them he shall push <S%H5055><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> and they <S%H1992><s%> are the ten thousands <S%H7233><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and they <S%H1992><s%> are the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>
And of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> Rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> in thy going out; <S%H3318><s%> and, Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> in thy tents. <S%H168><s%>

They shall call <S%H7121><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> unto the mountain; <S%H2022><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> they shall offer <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of righteousness: <S%H6664><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they shall suck <S%H3243><s%> of the abundance <S%H8228><s%> of the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and of treasures <S%H8226><s%> hid <S%H2934><s%> in the sand. <S%H2344><s%>

And of Gad <S%H1410><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be he that enlargeth <S%H7337><s%> Gad: <S%H1410><s%> he dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> as a lion, <S%H3833><s%> and teareth <S%H2963><s%> the arm <S%H2220><s%> with <S%H637><s%> the crown of the head. <S%H6936><s%>

And he provided <S%H7200><s%> the first part <S%H7225><s%> for himself, because <S%H3588><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> in a portion <S%H2513><s%> of the lawgiver, <S%H2710><s%> was he seated; <S%H5603><s%> and he came <S%H857><s%> with the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> he executed <S%H6213><s%> the justice <S%H6666><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and his judgments <S%H4941><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And of Dan <S%H1835><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> Dan <S%H1835><s%> is a lion's <S%H738><s%> whelp: <S%H1482><s%> he shall leap <S%H2187><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

And of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> O Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> satisfied <S%H7649><s%> with favor, <S%H7522><s%> and full <S%H4392><s%> with the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> possess <S%H3423><s%> thou the west <S%H3220><s%> and the south. <S%H1864><s%>

And of Asher <S%H836><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> Let Asher <S%H836><s%> be blessed <S%H1288><s%> with children; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> let him be <S%H1961><s%> acceptable <S%H7521><s%> to his brethren, <S%H251><s%> and let him dip <S%H2881><s%> his foot <S%H7272><s%> in oil. <S%H8081><s%>
Thy shoes <S%H4515><s%> shall be iron <S%H1270><s%> and brass; <S%H5178><s%> and as thy days, <S%H3117><s%> so shall thy strength <S%H1679><s%> be.

There is none <S%H369><s%> like unto the God <S%H410><s%> of Jeshurun, <S%H3484><s%> who rideth upon <S%H7392><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> in thy help, <S%H5828><s%> and in his excellency <S%H1346><s%> on the sky. <S%H7834><s%>

The eternal <S%H6924><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is thy refuge, <S%H4585><s%> and underneath <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> are the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> arms: <S%H2220><s%> and he shall thrust out <S%H1644><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee; and shall say, <S%H559><s%> Destroy <S%H8045><s%> them.

Israel <S%H3478><s%> then shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in safety <S%H983><s%> alone: <S%H910><s%> the fountain <S%H5869><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall be upon <S%H413><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of corn <S%H1715><s%> and wine; <S%H8492><s%> also <S%H637><s%> his heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall drop down <S%H6201><s%> dew. <S%H2919><s%>

Happy <S%H835><s%> art thou, O Israel: <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is like unto thee, <S%H3644><s%> O people <S%H5971><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> by the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the shield <S%H4043><s%> of thy help, <S%H5828><s%> and who <S%H834><s%> is the sword <S%H2719><s%> of thy excellency! <S%H1346><s%> and thine enemies <S%H341><s%> shall be found liars <S%H3584><s%> unto thee; and thou <S%H859><s%> shalt tread <S%H1869><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> their high places. <S%H1116><s%>
